nodes.text: The Thieves Bunker was a hideout used by techno-thieves near the city of Narmle on Naboo's swamp moon of Rori during the time of the Galactic Civil War. Sometime following the Battle of Yavin in 0 BBY, Seldair Keeloo tasked an Imperial operative with killing several of the thieves to recover a prototype rocket important to Captain Thrawn.
The Thieves Bunker was a location in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011.
